title: lerne zu lieben
author: lerne zu lieben
content: What are your goals when investing in new coins? Did you get a huge profit from the new coins? Can you recommend a new coin worth investing besides LUNA?

comments.author: hyudien
comments.body: Quote from: lerne zu lieben on May 28, 2022, 03:53:21 PMWhat are your goals when investing in new coins? Did you get a huge profit from the new coins? Can you recommend a new coin worth investing besides LUNA?LUNA? do you think it's profitable? when people no longer believe that Do Kwon is playing with crypto. I'd rather avoid going crazy than having to drop money on a new crypto where it's not clear where it will end up.There is no guarantee for new projects at this time, the market is no longer responding. We're starting to enter a fairly long bear market. Especially if you intend to start investing in new coins.If you have done research on a project, then stay away from hype stuff like LUNA.Oh, maybe LUNA v2 is now supported by many major exchanges? Naturally, because the stock exchange suffered heavy losses due to the current LUNA crash. So what they do is take back the lost capital.

comments.author: ItsCrafty
comments.body: Quote from: lerne zu lieben on May 28, 2022, 03:53:21 PMWhat are your goals when investing in new coins? Did you get a huge profit from the new coins? Can you recommend a new coin worth investing besides LUNA?New coin can give you best profit but not every coin. Project like StepN,Fitfi and bloktopia gave their early investor very good profit but it's also true that 90% project did not have their investor enough profit. I will recommend only Binance and Kucoin launchpad tokens because money flow will be high if project got hype.

comments.author: Jackl87
comments.body: Quote from: lerne zu lieben on May 28, 2022, 03:53:21 PMWhat are your goals when investing in new coins? Did you get a huge profit from the new coins? Can you recommend a new coin worth investing besides LUNA?In general i think that new projects have the biggest potential in terms of possible profit. I mean for that conclusion you only need to check on some of those projects that are now in the top 20 in terms of coinmarketcap. Projects like for example solana are not that old but early investors already made a x50 of their current investment even now after the market is in a downward trend for many weeks now.The other part of the truth is of course that the risk for a total loss of your investment is very high when you invest into new and upcoming projects. So the principle "only invest what you can afford to lose" is even more true for new projects than for cryptos in general. Also when a market is going down. Small and new projects are usually falling even more.

comments.author: LogitechMouse
comments.body: Quote from: lerne zu lieben on May 28, 2022, 03:53:21 PMWhat are your goals when investing in new coins? Did you get a huge profit from the new coins? Can you recommend a new coin worth investing besides LUNA?Big no-no for me.I'm not investing in new projects or new coins because they are more risky than those top market cap coins.I only have a limited budget to invest that is why I'm a bit conservative and focusing more on low risk, low reward coins such as Bitcoin, Ethereum, BNB etc. Since I'm not investing into new coins, I'm not getting huge profits either, but I've already seen many people gaining huge profits from investing into new projects. It's a high risk but high reward strategy as well. LUNA?? Just stay away from that shitcoin. As of this moment, the coin went down from near $20 to now near $5 and expect that it will go lower until it will become a worthless shitcoin. Like I said, what happened to the old LUNA will not be forgotten by just creating a new blockchain or new coin whatsoever. Do Kwon's reputation has been affected by what happened, therefore the trust of the investors to him is already gone.

comments.author: Cuda911
comments.body: Quote from: ItsCrafty on May 28, 2022, 04:09:29 PMQuote from: lerne zu lieben on May 28, 2022, 03:53:21 PMWhat are your goals when investing in new coins? Did you get a huge profit from the new coins? Can you recommend a new coin worth investing besides LUNA?New coin can give you best profit but not every coin. Project like StepN,Fitfi and bloktopia gave their early investor very good profit but it's also true that 90% project did not have their investor enough profit. I will recommend only Binance and Kucoin launchpad tokens because money flow will be high if project got hype.Good point, every projects that used Binance exchange to raise money in 2018 did very well, from Matic down to Harmony, it's just that this days things are a bit different, we now have better launchpad platforms with higher success stories than Binance, for example BSCpad and Polkastarter, they have did so very well introducing better projects to the masses.

comments.author: babygun
comments.body: Quote from: Jackl87 on May 28, 2022, 04:27:59 PMIn general i think that new projects have the biggest potential in terms of possible profit. I mean for that conclusion you only need to check on some of those projects that are now in the top 20 in terms of coinmarketcap. Projects like for example solana are not that old but early investors already made a x50 of their current investment even now after the market is in a downward trend for many weeks now.The other part of the truth is of course that the risk for a total loss of your investment is very high when you invest into new and upcoming projects. So the principle "only invest what you can afford to lose" is even more true for new projects than for cryptos in general. Also when a market is going down. Small and new projects are usually falling even more.If you get in early enough in a real promising coin, you can indeed have massive profits (x50 or higher) but you really need to find the hiddem gems. In a bull market everything goes up like crazy and it is easy to make profits. But in a bear market like this, some coins can drop 80 or 90% and will never reach their old price anymore...I still like to take some risk from time to time to invest in hype or new projects, but only with low amounts. Risk is sometimes quite high to loose all your money.

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: Quote from: lerne zu lieben on May 28, 2022, 03:53:21 PMWhat are your goals when investing in new coins? Did you get a huge profit from the new coins? Can you recommend a new coin worth investing besides LUNA?Looks like it's time for us to stop talking about Terra (LUNA) who has messed up the crypto space. Whatever choice of new coins you want to invest is up to you, but don't dabble with Terra (LUNA). BTW, I can't recommend any new projects for now, if you want to know about new projects, you can search for them on various Initial platforms and be prepared to buy them later.

comments.author: Maliceprime
comments.body: Luna is a messed up project, newbies need to stop talking about the project and find the better ones, what about Saito, Metahero, Immutable X, and few other web 3 / 2nd layer blockchain projects? I believe that's what will matter in near future.

comments.author: lerne zu lieben
comments.body: It seems that many people have misunderstood.Please pay attention once again My statement.Can you recommend a new coin worth investing besides LUNA?

comments.author: tvplus006
comments.body: Quote from: lerne zu lieben on May 28, 2022, 03:53:21 PMWhat are your goals when investing in new coins? Did you get a huge profit from the new coins? ..As a rule, new coins are not launched in the bear market, since after a short pump, the price drops lower than it was sold during the pre-sale. Wait until the market stabilizes, it will be a good time to buy coins at a low price that have an established community, a good team and well-known investors.

comments.author: livingfree
comments.body: Luna is already out of choices.Just look at how much the Luna 2.0, the new version of it, and many have already dumped it as soon as they've received the airdrop in some exchanges. While in Binance, it's still close and they don't want to be altogether with other exchanges that have opened it.If you're for altcoin, just go with the top altcoins like Eth and BNB. That's what I think are the best right now and don't want to be too much diversified with it if you don't have bitcoin.

comments.author: albon
comments.body: Quote from: lerne zu lieben on May 28, 2022, 04:58:18 PMIt seems that many people have misunderstood.Please pay attention once again My statement.Can you recommend a new coin worth investing besides LUNA?I will recommend to you some of the tokens that I invested in this year, they are GMT, LBLOCK, MANA, Hydra, and SOL, and I hope to make profits from them in the future after the market conditions recover. This is not investment advice, please do not forget to do your own research on these tokens in terms of use case..etc, Sir, there is a great risk in new tokens that are not listed in the big exchanges. Do you want to lose your money?

comments.author: jaberwock
comments.body: Quote from: lerne zu lieben on May 28, 2022, 03:53:21 PMWhat are your goals when investing in new coins? Did you get a huge profit from the new coins? Can you recommend a new coin worth investing besides LUNA?I usually have 2 types of expectations from my investment in altcoins.Short Term Sharp Investments: Here I invest in tokens with hype behind them and I am very sharp about when to sell the tokens because they have no long term value so if you miss the chance, you lose money. Examples can be Shiba Inu, etcLong Term Solid Investments: These are tokens I can hold for years without dropping a sweat and these include top 100 marketcap coins with some development in sight like ETH (2.0 coming) and Solana, BNB.

comments.author: Johnyz
comments.body: Quote from: lerne zu lieben on May 28, 2022, 03:53:21 PMWhat are your goals when investing in new coins? Did you get a huge profit from the new coins? Can you recommend a new coin worth investing besides LUNA?Lucky to those who get in early and exit right away because as you can see in the market, LUNA 2.0 is already down by 80% and this us just their first day out in the market. It looks like, investor is not interested anymore with LUNA, and this is just an ordinary token which is more volatile. The old LUNA might also start to die because of this, well I still have it but its fine if I lose that money, it’s not that big anyway.

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: Step App and StepN showed themselves well as new coins, giving x7-x40 to market investors. The best investments so far this year. The sneakers in StepN are also selling well. You can invest in minting new NFT tokens and make a profit, so far the payback is fast and the returns are good. As long as there is a hype around this project, it is a justified investment. Good new projects, came out in 2021 and showed good profitability in tens x's.

comments.author: palle11
comments.body: Quote from: lerne zu lieben on May 28, 2022, 03:53:21 PMI usually have 2 types of expectations from my investment in altcoins.Short Term Sharp Investments: Here I invest in tokens with hype behind them and I am very sharp about when to sell the tokens because they have no long term value so if you miss the chance, you lose money. Examples can be Shiba Inu, etcAre you of the view that Shiba Inu is dead and not going to rise again? Shiba Inu is still looking more of prospect just like dogecoin also. The market is down and many projects are down because of bitcoin drop. I expect Shiba to rise and likewise dogecoin when Elon musk wake up to it again. Shiba still has the chance to rise because it is traded across popular exchanges including binance.

comments.author: Saisher
comments.body: Quote from: lerne zu lieben on May 28, 2022, 03:53:21 PMWhat are your goals when investing in new coins? Did you get a huge profit from the new coins? Can you recommend a new coin worth investing besides LUNA?Compared to projects three years ago there are a lot of risks involved in new coins right now, there are too many scammers now and they are good at creating projects that look good and are legit, it is hard to see the difference when there's a new trend or hype expect scammers to create a much better version of the trend.Luna is still in the speculative phase you can invest but there are still a lot of risks involved the developers' capability is still questionable and so many investors are in doubt, that for a project to take off they need investors' trust.

comments.author: bitkanu
comments.body: new coin could gives great and tremendous ROI but also could make your investment vanish into thin air and you should always remember that.if your benchmark of a great new altcoin is luna then that definitely gonna become a really low benchmark here honestly.you should instead look for new coin that could gives great ROI that didn't ended up causing millions lose their money, unlike luna there are some relatively new altcoins that are smart contract based like solana and matic, now the market share of smart contract based altcoin are already too competitive, so I doubt you could find any more newer smart contract altcoins.

comments.author: TimeTeller
comments.body: Quote from: bitkanu on May 28, 2022, 10:28:34 PMnew coin could gives great and tremendous ROI but also could make your investment vanish into thin air and you should always remember that.if your benchmark of a great new altcoin is luna then that definitely gonna become a really low benchmark here honestly.you should instead look for new coin that could gives great ROI that didn't ended up causing millions lose their money, unlike luna there are some relatively new altcoins that are smart contract based like solana and matic, now the market share of smart contract based altcoin are already too competitive, so I doubt you could find any more newer smart contract altcoins.Using LUNA as a benchmark is not a very smart idea. I can agree with SOL and MATIC, because they are now getting popular as alternative networks to be used.To be honest, it is hard to know potential coins to invest with. You really need to do your part of searching and studying them.You maybe can read some suggestions but you still need to your job of assessing them before spending your hard-earned money.
